history.title: Our Story
history.description: Unictava was born from a passion for technological innovation and a vision to transform how companies use immersive technologies. Our journey began with a deep curiosity about the potential of 3D and virtual reality, combined with continuous exploration of cutting-edge solutions. With years of experience in the sector and constant learning in modeling and programming, we have built a solid foundation of competencies that allows us to deliver exceptional results to our clients. Today, Unictava is recognized as a trusted partner for companies seeking to integrate the most advanced technologies into their processes.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team is composed of highly qualified professionals, each with specific skills in their area. The combination of creativity, technical abilities, and dedication is what allows us to deliver innovative and high-quality projects for our clients. We are more than a team: we are a group of enthusiasts working together to transform ideas into reality.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Unictava's mission is to bring cutting-edge 3D technologies to corporate and institutional realities, transforming innovation into concrete and tangible results. We are dedicated to facilitating the adoption of immersive solutions and sector-specific artificial intelligence, customized to meet the specific needs of our clients. Whether in simulations, training, or assistance through intelligent avatars, our goal is always to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our clients' operations while reducing operational costs.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Unictava's mission is to bring cutting-edge 3D technologies to corporate and institutional realities, transforming innovation into concrete and tangible results. We are dedicated to facilitating the adoption of immersive solutions and sector-specific artificial intelligence, customized to meet the specific needs of our clients. Whether in simulations, training, or assistance through intelligent avatars, our goal is always to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our clients' operations while reducing operational costs.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We are constantly seeking new ways to elevate technology to higher levels, exploring the latest frontiers of AI and 3D.

items.title: Quality
items.description: We ensure excellent results, with attention to detail in all phases of the project, from conception to final implementation.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We believe in clear and honest communication with our clients, building relationships based on trust and lasting collaboration.

future.title: Current and Future Purpose
future.description: Unictava's current focus is to remain at the forefront of the 3D technology sector, <highlight1>expanding our services</highlight1> and continuing to innovate in the fields of <highlight2>virtual reality</highlight2>, <highlight3>artificial intelligence</highlight3>, and <highlight4>immersive simulations</highlight4>. <highlight5>We look to the future with the goal</highlight5> to consolidate our position as <highlight6>industry leaders</highlight6> and <highlight7>continue to offer solutions that transform business realities</highlight7>.

ai.heroTitle: Turn your company's knowledge into a smart, fast and fully tailored AI.
ai.description: We develop professional AI systems trained on your documents and processes—capable of answering, teaching, supporting teams and enhancing training with precision. Solutions available with or without 3D avatars, on local servers or cloud infrastructure.

cinematics.heroTitle: Realistic physical devices fully integrated with your VR/AR training.
cinematics.description: We build physical simulators—firearms, tools and technical equipment—with sensors, triggers, haptics and precise calibration for VR/AR environments. Complete hardware + software solutions for professional training, security, industry and operational forces.

simulation.heroTitle: Realistic training for any field—from corporate operations to military and judicial environments.
simulation.description: We create full 3D simulations for technical training, education, safety, operational processes and scenario analysis. Realistic environments designed to train, assess, repeat and learn safely and effectively.

education.heroTitle: Accelerated learning through immersive, gamified and fully interactive experiences.
education.description: We transform educational content into engaging 3D lessons—featuring virtual labs, simulated practice, storytelling and gamification. Ideal for schools, universities, companies and institutions seeking modern, impactful training.

games.heroTitle: Complete, optimized and fully tailored 3D games for any idea or platform.
games.description: We develop professional 3D games—educational, corporate, narrative, multiplayer or gamified. From concept to final gameplay, we deliver art, mechanics, animations, optimization and a smooth, high-quality experience.

vrar.heroTitle: Immersive applications tailored for training, simulators, education, events and architectural visualization.
vrar.description: We develop VR/AR solutions compatible with Meta Quest, Pico, Vive and PCVR. Custom-built standalone or high-performance experiences, including simulators, architectural tours, games and professional training applications.

projects.title: Completed Projects
projects.project1Desc: Implementation of 3D avatars for interactive training courses, improving learning and information retention.
projects.project2Desc: Replacement of traditional chatbots with 3D human bots, increasing customer satisfaction and reducing response times.
projects.project3Desc: Creation of realistic simulations for training doctors and nurses, using avatars that can respond and interact in real-time.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: What are the technical requirements to implement VR and AR solutions?
faq.answer1: Requirements vary depending on project complexity, but generally require a platform with 3D rendering capability and support for AI technologies such as NLP and machine learning.
faq.question2: Can 3D avatars be integrated with existing systems?
faq.answer2: Yes, our avatars are designed to easily integrate with most CRM systems, e-learning platforms, and websites.
faq.question3: What is the average implementation time?
faq.answer3: Implementation time varies depending on project complexity, but typically takes between 4 to 12 weeks for a complete solution.

hero.title: Custom Artificial Intelligence for Companies
hero.description: We transform your organization's knowledge into a precise, secure and ready-to-use AI system. UnicTava develops tailor-made Artificial Intelligence solutions for businesses of all sizes. We train the AI using your own documents, procedures, PDFs, manuals, videos and internal materials — ensuring accurate, consistent and industry-specific responses.

whatItDoes.title: What can our AI do?
whatItDoes.item1Title: AI trained with your company's content
whatItDoes.item1Text: It learns exactly what you provide: procedures, internal rules, methodologies, educational content and much more.
whatItDoes.item2Text: Our technology is not tied to a single field. It adapts to:
whatItDoes.item4Text: For large volumes of knowledge or heavy workflows, we use multiple agents for faster and more stable performance.
whatItDoes.item5Text: Add new training materials whenever needed. Your AI grows as your company evolves.

advantages.title: Key Advantages
advantages.item2Text: Faster decisions and reduced research time.
advantages.item3Text: Less repetition, fewer errors, greater productivity.
advantages.item4Text: The AI reflects your company's identity and processes.
advantages.item5Text: Accessible on any device, at any time.
advantages.item6Text: Can run locally or in a secure cloud environment.
advantages.item7Text: Works in Portuguese, Italian, English, Spanish, French and more.
advantages.item9Text: Compatible with internal systems and learning platforms.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: Large language models trained specifically with your company's content and expertise.
technologies.item2Text: Multiple AI agents working together to accelerate responses and manage large volumes of information.
technologies.item3Text: Advanced vectorization technology enabling deep semantic search and contextual understanding of extensive documents.
technologies.item4Text: Intelligent indexing and automatic content categorization systems for optimized retrieval.
technologies.item5Text: Realistic virtual characters that humanize interaction and make the experience more immersive and natural.
technologies.item6Text: Flexible deployment: secure cloud hosting or local installation in your company's infrastructure for maximum privacy.
technologies.item7Text: Intuitive dashboards to manage, update and monitor AI performance in real-time.
technologies.item8Text: Flexible architecture that grows with your company, allowing you to add features and content without rebuilding.

projects.title: Example Projects Delivered
projects.item1Text: Assists students, answers questions and explains content clearly.
projects.item2Text: Searches regulations, explains procedures and supports technical teams.
projects.item3Text: Improves onboarding, standardizes processes and reduces repetitive questions.
projects.item4Text: Supports procedures, internal guidelines and fiscal documentation.
projects.item5Text: Organizes protocols, training materials and specialized information.
projects.item6Text: Explains services, protocols, itineraries and operational procedures.
projects.item7Text: AI system used for internal training, answering technical questions and supporting teams.
projects.item8Text: Used in immersive courses with animated explanations and natural interaction.
projects.item9Text: Trained with regulations and internal documents, delivering fast and reliable answers to legal teams.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: How long does it take to train the AI?
faq.answer1: Between 3 and 15 days, depending on the content volume.
faq.question2: Can the AI be updated later?
faq.answer2: Yes. More content can be added at any time.
faq.answer3: Absolutely. Choose between local hosting or secure cloud infrastructure.
faq.answer4: Yes, it can be trained to operate in several languages.
faq.answer6: No. It supports and enhances processes but does not replace specialists.
faq.question7: Can any type of company use this?
faq.answer7: Yes. Just provide the content for training.

cta.title: Ready to transform your company's knowledge into a powerful intelligent system?
cta.subtitle: Contact us and tell us about your project. We build a fully personalized AI solution for your needs.

hero.title: Professional Simulators & Smart Devices for Virtual Reality
hero.description: We create functional physical replicas for VR/AR training — weapons, tools, technical equipment and custom devices. UnicTava develops complete simulators — hardware + software — designed for full integration with Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality experiences.
hero.description2: We build realistic physical replicas (3D-printed or technically modeled), equipped with electronic sensors, triggers, buttons, vibration systems, microcontrollers and precise calibration for professional training. We develop simulators for any purpose: security forces, police training, industrial and technical maintenance, machine operation, technical education, corporate environments, risk simulators, military training, emergency scenarios. If a client needs a physical device connected to VR, we build it.

whatItDoes.title: What We Develop
whatItDoes.item4Text: Simulators are ideal when the user must:
item4List: Feel the real tool in their hands
Use tools that cannot be handled in real life

advantages.title: Client Benefits
advantages.item1Text: Physical interaction increases immersion and prepares users for real-world situations.
advantages.item2Text: Train dangerous scenarios without real risk.
advantages.item3Text: The physical device is perfectly aligned with the virtual object — aim, movement, firing and interaction.
advantages.item4Text: We design the simulator exactly as the client needs.
advantages.item5Text: Works with any modern VR system.
advantages.item6Text: Usage data, accuracy, errors, reaction time and full stats can be recorded.
advantages.item7Text: New parts, modules or features can be added easily.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: We use professional high-resolution 3D printers to create realistic and durable physical replicas, ensuring dimensional accuracy and industrial-grade technical finish.
technologies.item2Text: We work with engineering polymers, technical resins and composite materials that guarantee strength, durability and appropriate weight for intensive professional use.
technologies.item3Text: We integrate custom electronic boards, power systems, connectors and circuits designed specifically for each simulator, with proper protection and insulation.
technologies.item4Text: We program microcontrollers (Arduino, ESP32, STM32) to manage sensors, buttons, triggers and wireless communication with the VR system in real-time.
technologies.item5Text: We implement Hall sensors, force sensors, tactical buttons and precision switches to detect movement, pressure, position and activation with high sensitivity.
technologies.item6Text: We integrate vibration motors, haptic actuators and tactile feedback systems to simulate weapon recoil, impacts, textures and realistic physical sensations.
technologies.item7Text: We develop automatic calibration routines that adjust sensors, position, aim and synchronization with the VR environment, ensuring constant precision without manual adjustments.
technologies.item8Text: We create custom firmware for each device, with optimized control logic, Bluetooth/WiFi communication, power management and remote updates when needed.

projects.title: Example Projects
projects.item1Text: Physical replica with internal trigger, calibrated aiming, Bluetooth connection and perfect sync with virtual shooting.
projects.item2Text: Built with special sensors, safety functions and full integration with police training environments.
projects.item3Text: Replica with multiple sensors, reinforced structure and connectivity for tactical training.
projects.item4Text: Built for technical maintenance education with sensor reading and haptic feedback.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The 3D Cinematics solutions transformed my project. The digital characters were so realistic that the audience had difficulty distinguishing between real and virtual.
testimonials.item2Text: The integration of 3D effects in our commercials increased engagement and made our ads truly memorable.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: How long does it take to create a simulator?
faq.question2: Can I request any type of simulator?
faq.answer2: Yes — from weapons to industrial tools and custom devices.
faq.answer3: Meta Quest, Pico, Vive, Varjo, Valve Index and all OpenXR-compatible headsets.
faq.question4: How does the device connect to VR?
faq.question5: Do you also build the software?
faq.answer5: Yes, we develop the full VR environment in Unreal Engine.
faq.answer6: Yes, multiple users can train together.
faq.answer7: Yes — accuracy, mistakes, reaction time, performance, hitbox and more.

cta.title: Need a realistic simulator for training?
cta.subtitle: Want to integrate a physical device into your company's VR system? Contact us today. We develop complete simulators — hardware and software — fully tailored to your objectives.

hero.title: Professional 3D Simulations for Training, Education and Operational Processes
hero.description: We create realistic 3D environments for training, decision-making, technical instruction and immersive experiences across any industry. UnicTava develops custom 3D simulations for companies, schools, public and private institutions, technical sectors, corporate training, security, military operations, psychology, tourism and even sensitive areas such as judicial and procedural environments. If the goal is to simulate, train, teach, evaluate, explain or demonstrate, we create the ideal 3D simulation. We work with PC simulations, VR simulations and hybrid simulations (PC + VR). From concept to final product, everything is developed internally.

whatItDoes.title: What We Develop?
whatItDoes.item2Text: For schools, universities and training institutions:
whatItDoes.item5Text: Based on real projects you already develop:
whatItDoes.item6Text: A sensitive but highly relevant area:
whatItDoes.item7Text: For rare, unusual or high-risk events — when real environments are dangerous, expensive or impossible to reproduce.

advantages.title: Why Use 3D Simulations?
advantages.item1Text: Users see, interact, repeat and retain significantly better.
advantages.item2Text: Dangerous environments can be safely simulated.
advantages.item3Text: No need to build complex physical setups.
advantages.item4Text: All learners train the same way, with equal quality.
advantages.item5Text: Unusual events can be practiced as many times as needed.
advantages.item6Text: We build exactly the simulation the client requires.
advantages.item7Text: New modules, areas or phases can be added later.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item2Text: Maximum immersion. Compatible with Meta Quest, Pico, Vive and PCVR.
technologies.item3Text: Users can switch between PC and VR as needed.

projects.title: Example Projects
projects.item1Text: Industrial environments with tasks, functional machinery and system feedback.
projects.item2Text: Designed for technical courses with objects, guided processes and quizzes.
projects.item3Text: Strategic scenarios with AI, performance evaluation and missions.
projects.item4Text: 3D reconstruction of environments for case study and legal education.
projects.item5Text: Evacuation, risk analysis, fire scenarios and first aid training.

faq.title: FAQ — Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How long does it take to develop a 3D simulation?
faq.answer1: 15 days to 6 months, depending on complexity.
faq.question2: Do I need to choose between PC and VR?
faq.answer2: No. We can develop for both simultaneously.
faq.answer3: Yes. All projects are fully expandable.
faq.question4: Do you work with sensitive content (justice, police, etc.)?
faq.answer4: Yes. We have experience with judicial, investigative and police-oriented projects.
faq.question6: Can avatars or characters be integrated?
faq.answer6: Yes. MetaHumans and advanced animation systems are supported.

cta.title: Want to transform a process, lesson or complex scenario into a realistic simulation?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today and we'll create a bespoke 3D experience for your project.

hero.title: Faster learning, higher engagement, and training built for the future.
hero.description: Traditional education is quickly becoming outdated.
hero.description2: Static materials, passive lectures and old methodologies no longer match the pace of the modern world — nor the way people learn today.
hero.description3: That's why UnicTava develops fully interactive, immersive and gamified 3D education and training programs, designed to accelerate learning and increase retention.

whatItDoes.title: Training for Any Field
whatItDoes.description: We transform any type of content into an interactive educational experience — even topics considered difficult, technical or "impossible" to represent in 3D.
whatItDoes.subtitle: Examples:
whatItDoes.item1Text: Virtual lessons, case simulations, procedural environments
whatItDoes.conclusion: If there is content to teach, we can turn it into a smart and engaging 3D experience.

experienceTypes.title: Types of Experiences We Create
experienceTypes.item1Text: Levels, challenges, points, goals and real-time feedback — maximizing engagement. We transform learning into an interactive and rewarding journey, where every achievement drives the learner to advance.
experienceTypes.item2Text: Complete environments with videos, text, animations, quizzes, avatars and custom paths. We create virtual spaces that replicate and surpass the in-person experience, offering resources impossible in the physical world.
experienceTypes.item3Text: Experiments, controlled scenarios, case studies and replicable procedures. We allow students to practice complex procedures in a safe environment, without risks or costs of physical equipment.
experienceTypes.item4Text: Realistic training for companies, technical schools and specialized sectors. We develop precise simulations of industrial processes, machinery operation and corporate protocols.
experienceTypes.item5Text: Content combining 3D animation, video, narration, interactions and storytelling. We integrate multiple media to create rich and engaging educational experiences that cater to different learning styles.

advantages.title: Why Our Solutions Work
advantages.item1Text: The brain learns up to 3x faster with interactive visual experiences.
advantages.item2Text: Students participate, decide and interact — resulting in dramatically higher retention.
advantages.item3Text: We turn any subject into clear, structured, interactive content.
advantages.item4Text: Less need for physical labs, travel or printed materials.
advantages.item5Text: The same course can be used by thousands of students.
advantages.item6Text: Built-in evaluation, statistics, progress tracking and reports.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: We use cutting-edge 3D graphics technologies to create realistic and engaging learning environments.
technologies.item2Text: Integration of VR and AR for immersive and interactive learning experiences.
technologies.item3Text: Implementation of AI to personalize learning paths and provide real-time feedback.
technologies.item4Text: Compatibility with major e-learning platforms for easy integration and course management.

projects.title: Example Projects
projects.item1Text: Process simulations, virtual courtroom and digital tutors.
projects.item2Text: Machinery, tools and operational procedures with direct interaction.
projects.item3Text: Gamified lessons, quizzes, dynamic environments and storytelling.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The 3D solutions transformed how my students learn. The interactivity and immersion made classes much more engaging and memorable.
testimonials.item2Text: The 3D training significantly improved our employees' preparation. The interactive modules increased engagement and information retention.

faq.title: FAQ — Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Does it work without VR goggles?
faq.answer1: Yes. Most courses are built for PC, with optional VR mode.
faq.question2: Can I use my own content?
faq.answer2: Yes. The course is entirely based on the material you provide.
faq.answer3: Yes — with scores, statistics and automatic reporting.
faq.question4: Do you create complex courses (like legal training)?
faq.answer4: Yes. We have experience in highly technical fields.
faq.answer5: Between 20 days and 3 months, depending on complexity.

cta.title: Want to turn an ordinary course into a modern, engaging and unforgettable learning experience?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today. We create 3D educational experiences that truly transform learning.

hero.title: Virtual Reality & Augmented Reality
hero.description: We create fully immersive and customized experiences for companies, education, simulations, games and professional training. UnicTava develops complete Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR) applications for any type of need — from corporate training to highly realistic simulators, educational experiences, events, presentations, architecture, tourism and gamified projects.
hero.description2: We work with all major headsets: Meta Quest 2/3/Pro, Pico 4/Enterprise, HTC Vive, Varjo, Valve Index and Windows Mixed Reality. We create standalone solutions (installed directly on the headset) or PCVR experiences (high-performance PC-connected). You choose how you want your experience to be delivered.

whatItDoes.title: What We Develop
item5List: interaction with doors, lights and objects
material and lighting variations in real time

deliveryModes.title: Delivery Modes
deliveryModes.item1Text: Perfect for lightweight, portable projects. Compatible with Meta Quest, Pico and Vive XR.
deliveryModes.item2Text: Maximum graphic fidelity and complex environments. Ideal for professional simulators, architecture and advanced games.
deliveryModes.item3Text: Real-time interaction between multiple users with voice, gestures and synced actions.

advantages.title: Advantages of Our VR/AR Solutions
advantages.item2Text: Replaces expensive or difficult real-world scenarios.
advantages.item4Text: Simulate dangerous scenarios with zero real-world risk.
advantages.item6Text: New scenes, mechanics and content can be added anytime.
advantages.item7Text: Works on all major devices — Quest, Pico, Vive and PCVR.

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.item1Text: Full support for all major headsets: Meta Quest 2/3/Pro, Pico 4/Enterprise, HTC Vive, Varjo XR-3/4, Valve Index and all Windows Mixed Reality devices. Universal compatibility via OpenXR.
technologies.item2Text: Development for AR devices like Microsoft HoloLens, Magic Leap, mobile ARKit (iOS) and ARCore (Android). Marker tracking, interactive manuals and real-world integration.
technologies.item3Text: We use Unreal Engine and Unity with full XR support, including real-time rendering, advanced physics, and cross-platform optimization for standalone, PCVR and mobile.
technologies.item4Text: Multiplayer architecture with Photon, Mirror or custom networking solutions. Voice chat, synchronized actions, room management and lobbies with anti-cheat.
technologies.item5Text: Customizable avatars with inverse kinematics (IK), hand tracking support, motion capture integration and interactive gestures.
technologies.item6Text: Cloud-based rendering for ultra-realistic graphics without needing high-end hardware. Ideal for large-scale architectural walkthroughs and enterprise VR.
technologies.item7Text: Real-time tracking of user actions, eye-tracking support, performance metrics and LMS integration for training applications.
technologies.item8Text: Every project is built with modularity in mind, allowing new levels, features and mechanics to be added over time without full reconstruction.

projects.title: Example Projects
projects.item1Text: Realistic training with simulated weapon, calibrated aim, physical interaction and immersive environment.
projects.item2Text: VR platform with classrooms, avatars, lessons, interactions and data capture modules.
projects.item3Text: Complete navigable house with interactive doors, dynamic lights and PCVR mode.
projects.item4Text: Interactive minigame with gamification and live scoreboard.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.item1Text: The VR solutions revolutionized how we present our projects to clients. The ability to visualize and modify interiors in real-time greatly improved our efficiency and client satisfaction.
testimonials.item2Text: The integration of AR in our construction sites greatly facilitated project planning and execution. The precision and interactivity of AR solutions were a real game-changer.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: How long does it take to create a VR/AR project?
faq.answer1: 15 days to 4 months, depending on complexity.
faq.question2: Does it work with any headset?
faq.answer2: Yes — Meta, Pico, HTC Vive, Varjo, Valve Index and all OpenXR-compatible headsets.
faq.question4: Can I add new modules later?
faq.answer5: Yes — simulated weapons, buttons, ESP32 and custom devices.
faq.question7: Can it be used on PC without a headset?

cta.title: Want to turn an idea into an immersive experience?
cta.subtitle: Or do you need a full VR/AR project for your company, school or event? Contact us today. We develop your immersive solution from scratch using cutting-edge technology.

privacyPolicy.metaDescription: UnicTava Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: This website collects personal data (name, email, phone) provided voluntarily by users through the quote form. Protecting your data is a priority for us, and this document explains how we handle your information.

section2.title: 2. Data Controller
section2.content: The controller responsible for the processing of personal data collected on this website is Rafael Tavares / UnicTava, headquartered at Via Montefeltro, 8/10, 20156 Milano MI, Italia.

section3.title: 3. Data Collected
section3.content: We collect the following information when you fill out our contact or quote form: Full name, Email address, Phone number (when voluntarily provided), Project type of interest, Message and project details, Attached files (when provided).

section4.title: 4. Purpose of Processing
section4.content: The collected data is used exclusively to respond to your quote and contact requests. We do not share your information with third parties without your explicit authorization, except when required by law.

section5.title: 5. Legal Basis and Storage
section5.content: The legal basis for processing your data is the explicit consent provided by checking the acceptance box on the form. Data is stored securely on our servers (Supabase) and kept only for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, generally up to 12 months.

section6.title: 6. User Rights
section6.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
section6.right1: Right of Access: request a copy of the data we hold about you
section6.right2: Right of Rectification: correct incorrect or incomplete data
section6.right3: Right to Erasure: request the deletion of your data
section6.right4: Right to Portability: receive your data in a structured format
section6.right5: Right to Lodge a Complaint: file a complaint with the competent data protection authority (Garante per la Protezione dei Dati Personali - Italy)

section7.title: 7. Retention Period
section7.content: Personal data will be kept for the time strictly necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected. After this period, the data will be deleted or anonymized. In general, we keep contact data for up to 12 months from the last interaction.

section8.title: 8. Data Security
section8.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration. However, no Internet transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section9.title: 9. Contact for Privacy Matters
section9.content: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about the processing of your personal data, contact us via email:

cookiePolicy.metaDescription: UnicTava Cookie Policy - Understand how we use cookies to improve your website experience
cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy

section1.title: 1. What are Cookies
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device when you visit them. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

section2.title: 2. Technical Cookies (Always Active)
section2.intro: These cookies are essential for the basic functioning of the website and do not require your prior consent:

cookie1.name: Session Cookie
cookie1.description: Keeps your session active while you browse the website. Expires when you close your browser.

cookie2.name: Language Preference Cookie
cookie2.description: Stores your language preference (Portuguese, English, or Italian). Duration: 12 months.

cookie3.name: Consent Cookie
cookie3.description: Records your cookie choices. Duration: 12 months.

section3.title: 3. Analytics Cookies (Optional)
section3.intro: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website, always anonymously. They require your consent:

cookie1.name: Google Analytics (_ga, _ga_*)
cookie1.description: Used to collect information about how visitors use our website. We use this information to compile reports and help us improve the website. The cookies collect information anonymously. Duration: 2 years.

cookie2.name: Third-party Cookies
cookie2.description: We may use third-party cookies for traffic analysis and user behavior.

section3.note: Important: According to Italian regulations (Garante per la Protezione dei Dati Personali), analytics and third-party cookies can only be activated after your explicit consent.

section4.title: 4. Cookie Management
section4.content1: When you access this website for the first time, you will see a consent banner where you can choose which cookie categories to accept. You can change your preferences at any time by clicking the 'Cookie Settings' link in the website footer.
section4.content2: You can also manage cookies directly in your browser settings. Consult your browser's help section for instructions on how to block or delete cookies.

section5.title: 5. Legal Basis
section5.content: As established by the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the guidelines of the Italian Garante, we obtain your explicit consent before activating non-essential cookies. Your consent is valid for 12 months, after which we will request it again.

section6.title: 6. Duration and Renewal
section6.content: Cookie consent is valid for 12 months. After this period, we will request your consent again through the cookie banner.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For questions about our cookie policy and your choices, contact us via email:

termsOfService.metaDescription: UnicTava Terms of Service - Learn about the rules and conditions for using our services

section1.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our website or services.

section2.title: 2. Description of Services
section2.content: UnicTava offers specialized services in 3D technologies, including:

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.content: All content on this website, including texts, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and data compilations, is the property of UnicTava or its content suppliers and is protected by Italian and international copyright laws.

section4.title: 4. Website Use
section4.intro: By using our website, you agree not to:
section4.prohibition1: Use the website in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the website
section4.prohibition2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website, servers, or connected networks
section4.prohibition3: Use the website for illegal or unauthorized purposes
section4.prohibition4: Violate any applicable laws in your jurisdiction

section5.title: 5. Forms and Quote Requests
section5.content1: Quote requests submitted through our form do not constitute a binding offer. All quotes are estimates subject to confirmation after detailed project analysis.
section5.content2: We reserve the right to refuse any quote request or project proposal at our sole discretion.
section5.content3: Timelines and costs mentioned in quotes are estimates and subject to formal confirmation through a written contract.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: UnicTava shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your access to or use of (or inability to access or use) this website or any content contained therein.

section7.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on this website. It is your responsibility to periodically review these terms.

section8.title: 8. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section8.content: These terms are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Italian Republic. Any dispute related to these terms will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Milan, Italy.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us via email:
